original_title: BoA the Live 裏ボア・・・聴かせ系
overview: BoA the LIVE Ura BoA... Kikase Kei is BoA's fifth DVD. It was released simultaneously with BoA COMPLETE CLIPS 2004-2006. The songs BoA performed did not contain any dancing due to a foot injury, but instead focused on her singing.
title: BoA the LIVE Ura BoA... Kikase Kei
